response.original_title: Damilola: Death of a Ten Year Old
response.overview: Former Met Police Officer and TV Presenter, Rav Wilding, re-traces the story of Damilola Taylor, the young boy who bled to death in a stairwell on a South London estate. At the time Rav was a police officer and working on the investigation into Damilola's killing and it remains his most vivid memory of his time with the Met.
response.title: Damilola: Death of a Ten Year Old
